statements: SELECT * FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result_value FROM lab_test_results ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, test_date FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_name LIKE 'Blood%';
SELECT test_id, patient_id, test_date FROM lab_test_results WHERE result_value > 100;
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM lab_test_results WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT test_name, MAX(result_value) AS max_result FROM lab_test_results GROUP BY test_name;
SELECT test_name, COUNT(*) AS test_count FROM lab_test_results WHERE result_value > 100 GROUP BY test_name ORDER BY test_count DESC;
SELECT test_name, AVG(result_value) AS avg_result FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_date > '2021-01-01' GROUP BY test_name HAVING avg_result > 50;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result_value, test_date FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_name LIKE '%blood%' AND result_value < 50 ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Lab_Test_Results WHERE patient_id = 100
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM Lab_Test_Results ORDER BY result_value DESC
SELECT * FROM Lab_Test_Results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT patient_id, test_name FROM Lab_Test_Results WHERE result_value > 100
SELECT patient_id, test_date FROM Lab_Test_Results ORDER BY test_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Lab_Test_Results WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, test_name FROM Lab_Test_Results WHERE patient_id = 1001 ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM Lab_Test_Results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01';
SELECT plan_id, diagnosis, medications FROM Treatment_Plans WHERE patient_id = 2002;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_tests FROM Lab_Test_Results GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_tests > 5 ORDER BY num_tests DESC;
SELECT * FROM Lab_Test_Results;
SELECT patient_id, test_type, test_result FROM Lab_Test_Results ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient_Details WHERE gender='F';
SELECT plan_id, patient_id, start_date, end_date FROM Treatment_Plans ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, address FROM Patient_Details WHERE age>50;
SELECT patient_id, test_type, test_result, test_date FROM Lab_Test_Results WHERE test_result > 50 ORDER BY test_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Details WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'F' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM Patient_Details WHERE gender = 'M' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT plan_id, plan_description, start_date, end_date FROM Treatment_Plans ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, address, test_type, test_date FROM Patient_Details JOIN Lab_Test_Results ON Patient_Details.patient_id = Lab_Test_Results.patient_id WHERE test_result < 20;
SELECT * FROM lab_test_results;
SELECT patient_id, test_id, result FROM lab_test_results WHERE result > 100;
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_type, test_cost FROM tests WHERE test_cost < 50;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, treatment_date FROM treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_tests FROM lab_test_results GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_tests > 3;
SELECT * FROM lab_test_results WHERE patient_id = 12345 AND test_id = 67890
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM lab_test_results INNER JOIN tests ON lab_test_results.test_id = tests.test_id WHERE patient_id = 54321

SELECT patient_name, test_name, result_value FROM lab_test_results INNER JOIN patients ON lab_test_results.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN tests ON lab_test_results.test_id = tests.test_id WHERE patient_id = 99999
SELECT patient_id, MAX(result_value) AS max_result FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_id = 13579 GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS unique_patients, COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM lab_test_results GROUP BY test_id
SELECT * FROM LabTests;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, test_result FROM LabTests WHERE test_date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT treatment_description, treatment_start_date, treatment_end_date FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT test_id_1, test_id_2, correlation_strength, correlation_description FROM TestCorrelations WHERE correlation_strength > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT test_name, test_result, test_date FROM LabTests WHERE test_result = 'Positive' ORDER BY test_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' AND patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT t.test_name, p.patient_name FROM LabTests t INNER JOIN Patients p ON t.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE t.test_result = 'Negative' AND p.patient_age > 50
SELECT DISTINCT t.test_result FROM LabTests t INNER JOIN Patients p ON t.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE p.patient_gender = 'Male'
